title: EZMaxMobile
description: EZMaxMobile** is an award-winning work execution Maximo mobile app that supports work processes ranging from inspections, rounds, and inventory management to planned and unplanned maintenance, and leverages your existing business rules and Maximo workflows. With over 25 delivered processes to choose from – all tailorable to your specific Maximo mobile needs – your technicians can do their jobs without having to jump from app to app.
